title: Afton Archive - The Complete Series | Valox
description: This series and creator is by far one of the most talented that I have come across, this episode is in chronological order of the FNaF lore. I hope you all enjoy and again, sorry for being inconsistent on my uploads, been busy with work and fighting a sickness. I'll be back to normal upload schedule very soon! Also! I now have a Discord server tied to this podcast, if you'd like to join please do! Enjoy the episode! <3 | Original Creator: ⁠https://youtu.be/zgI0CfaLzmw?si=F6OmhMrXOMabcPzK

title: Cults in Online Games
description: Finally feeling a lot better! So with that, back to my originally planned episode release schedule! Also, I now have a Discord server associated with this Podcast, if you'd like to join you're more than welcome to! In there you can share what ideas or what you want to see on this podcast along with glimpses at future episodes and a roadmap of what I have planned for the upcoming months. Enough with that now, this episode I found this video which is very interesting and kind of deviates from the ARG aspect of things and focuses on some real stuff that goes on within certain video games. I hope you all enjoy! :3 | Original Video: ⁠https://youtu.be/-Ta80mqCuJs?si=EszPvYNnxaih-Yqv

title: The Walten Files
description: This is all the episodes of the Walten Files :3 Hope you all enjoy! And also, thank you so much for the continued support and tuning in to all the episodes, it is honestly the best thing that has ever happened to me seeing how many people are watching this podcast along with all the comments <3 Thank you again so much! And with that, I hope you all enjoy this episode :3 | Original Video: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uShQXE1Dla8&list=PLS2QQK4hEK511TJjrkH8L12UYsVnOfgQs

title: The Minecraft Player Trapped In A Loop (Parts 1 & 2) | RGN
description: Sorry for the inconsistency in uploads and lacking on my planned upload schedule :/ For this episode I got you all with a new RGN upload and I really hope you all enjoy it :3 | I will hopefully be back soon with another upload but I've been extremely busy with some stuff going on in my personal life. Also, if you have any questions or anything at all feel free to message me on IG at: snootloop_ | Original Video(s): ⁠https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iKFyv0a5-XU&t=2s⁠ | ⁠https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2bRcnWCyyU&t=1s

title: The FNAF VHS Movie
description: I want to start off by saying that I apologize for not uploading anything new recently, I've been spending a lot of time with girlfriend and have gotten really sidetracked with all my work and my main job. I also want to say, thank you all so much for being here and enjoying this show so much! That seriously means the world to me and has made me beyond happy that so many of you tune in to these episodes and enjoy them so much <3 | This episode is by far the longest episode I will probably make for quite some time so I really hope you all enjoy it :3 If you ever have a request of what you would like to see on this podcast please feel free to either comment on here or DM on instagram @snootloop_ I absolutely love the requests that I've been given and I love uploading them for all of you. I also want to say that I'm sorry for deviating from posting the ARG videos but I may or may not be cooking up some ARG videos to upload... so stay tuned for that one :3 | And PLEASE go and show your support for these wonderful creators that were in this episode, this wouldn't be possible without them <3 | Battington: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/@Battington⁠ | Spectre: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/@SpectreAnimations⁠ | ReachAnimations: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/@ReachAnimations⁠ | TwelveMan: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/@TwelveManOP⁠

title: Vita Carnis | Full Series by Darian Quilloy
description: I don't know why I never thought of uploading this series, but this is one of my favorite series out there that isn't FNaF or Minecraft related. I hope you all enjoy this episode and if you have any more requests, please feel free to comment below or get in touch via instagram @snootloop_ :3 | Make sure to go show some love to the creator of this series! | Original Creator: ⁠https://www.youtube.com/@darian_quilloy

title: The Man In The Suit | Entire Series
description: I apologize for not uploading anything new recently, I have been extremely busy with work but will be uploading quite a few things in the upcoming days :3 This episode was inspired by a request that I got and I totally forgot about this wonderful series and I really hope you all enjoy! I also want to say that in my next episode there will be an announcement or more so a huge thank you to all of you viewers and followers of this show, so stay tuned for that <3 Also! For some of my next uploads I'm going to leave that to you guys :3 so please go and check out the Poll on this episode and if something you would like to see isn't on there please feel free to comment what you would like to see on this episode. | Much love from your Host, Keta <3 | As always, please go and show some love to this wonderful creator of this series <3 | https://www.youtube.com/@Unkn0wingly

title: The Boiled One and The GREYLOCK Tapes | Full Series of Both
description: Thank you so much for participating in last weeks poll and the winner was The Boiled One! I hope you all enjoy and I did make it into a double feature with The GREYLOCK Tapes :3 Also, will say this here as well, thank you all for such an amazing year! Because of you all this show ranked in the Top 10% of all video podcasts on Spotify! This wouldn't be possible without you guys <3 And also, I will be doing an upcoming Q&A as well! So feel free to ask me any questions but please don't make them too personal lol. Again, thank you all so much for making this such a memorable year! Love you all <3 (If you guys have any requests please leave a comment :3 I'm trying to get to all of the requests I've already gotten and I'm so sorry if I haven't gotten to yours yet, I will soon!) | As always, please please please go and show your love for these amazing creators! | https://www.youtube.com/@doctornowhere⁠ | https://www.youtube.com/@greylockhorror

title: The Monument Mythos & The Nixonverse | Full Series
description: Apologies again for being so late with another upload, I recently just moved into my new apartment and have been unpacking and some other things, but! Now that I'm all moved in, I will be trying to upload consistently on a schedule that will be starting next week, I will be uploading every Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday :3 Also! there will be a poll with this episode so please go and check that out, and as always, please feel free to send a request as to what you would like to see on here next! | Please go and show this creator your support, this wouldn't be possible without them <3 | https://www.youtube.com/@M4NTICOR3
